participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a love for nature and music.
participant_1.background: I once spent a week in a cabin in the mountains in the middle of winter and loved every minute of it. I go for a walk with my dogs every day. I'm a touring musician, but I also like gardening. i have an above average iq. I've had to give up some of my favorite foods to get healthy.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, with a passion for teaching and traveling.
participant_2.background: I am so proud of my daughter for graduating at the top of her class! i am from san fransisco. I'm proud of my swimming achievements in college and I'd brag to my friends about them if I were famous. Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling. i have bad luck with relationships.

content.text: Hey! I'm a musician. What do you do for a living?
I am a teacher. I teach music and math.
What's your favorite thing about teaching?
I love when a student finally gets it.
Yes! I love seeing the light bulb go off.
What's your favorite thing to do outside of work?
I love to travel and I'm also a huge fan of Comic Con.
I've never been to Comic Con, but I've heard great things.
It's so much fun! There are so many interesting people and great costumes.
Where's your favorite place to travel?
I love going to Europe. I've been to Italy, France, and Spain.
Those are all beautiful countries! I've always wanted to go to Italy.
It's amazing! You should definitely go!
